name: Porn Star Island
description:
It is a special island where beautiful girls from all over the world go on holiday and you are a real lucky man, you are also on this island.

Walk around the island be careful because in every place there may be a beautiful girl, hear each of them, learn her secrets, find out what she likes the most. Impress her.
If you like her, you can count on an unforgettable pleasure.

While walking around the island, you'll also come across some puzzles that allow you to enter special places.
